title: Performance and failure mechanisms of alkaline zinc anodes with addition of calcium zincate (Ca[Zn(OH)3]2·2H2O) under industrially relevant conditions
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00093E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Patrick K. Yang, Damon E. Turney, Michael Nyce, Bryan R. Wygant, Timothy N. Lambert, Stephen O'Brien, Gautam G. Yadav, Meir Weiner, Shinju Yang, Brendan E. Hawkins, Sanjoy Banerjee
Various zinc anodes with increasing calcium zincate (0%, 30%, 70%, 100%) were cycled at 50% theoretical Zn utilization to investigate cycle life and estimated cost. Failure mechanisms of majority 70% Zn/30% CaZn anodes are compared with pure CaZn.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
